about_the_game:
DON'T FORGET TO ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST!

Rogue Runner is a fast-paced Runner-like / Rogue-like, third-person shooter - action and platformer. You must run to break through the possibility you're stuck in. As you run you will discover different possibilities. Run, Kill, Die, Improve and Repeat to break the cycle!

A THIEF'S STORY

What is the one thing a thief would never want to steal? Something that would bring them nothing but trouble. Yet, that’s exactly what Alara did—she stole a probability machine of unimaginable power. The moment she used it, she found herself trapped in an endless loop of impossibility. To break the cycle, she’ll need all the help she can get—because this will be a long run.

SHOW YOUR RUN ON MAPS

With fully procedural generation and different themed maps, you're the only one immune to the odds! No matter which map it is, enemy - trap - boss, you'll have to take them all down to break the cycle.

REFUSE TO AGE

Every death you experience in the cycle brings you one step closer to permanent death in the real possibility. Use the ease and challenges of old age to your advantage and make it serve you!

ACCEPT THE CHALLENGES

During your run, listen out for merchants offering you different challenges or instant gifts. They're sure to have a whisper or two you'll enjoy.

DEVELOP YOUR CHARACTER IN THE VILLAGES

No matter which village you were born in, you can improve your character, try different builds and prepare yourself for much longer runs.
